mdRecord.dcterms:title: Virginia State Firemen’s Convention Parade, August 1948
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Virginia State Firemen’s Convention Parade, with labels for each county's band, the first photograph being the Harrisonburg Band, the second photograph being the Charlottesville Band, the third photograph being the Norfolk Band, the fourth photograph being the Harrisonburg Band again, the fifth photograph being the Alexandria Band, the sixth photograph being the Ladies Auxiliary of Harrisonburg, August 10-13, 1948
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
